item.title: CewlKid: 1
item.description: 介绍 An intermediate boot2root. The name is a hint. The start is CTF but the end is real world and worth the effort. Created in Virtualbox. Goal: Get the root flag. 地址：CewlKid: 1 virtualbox网络设置 首先需要保证攻击机和靶子
